name: Standard Dictionary File
summary: Learn about .CLX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Outlook with Ceelox SecureMail plugin

content: CLX files are used for supporting multiple languages. Examples include the American English Dictionary ssceam2.clx, the Brazilian Portuguese Dictionary sscepb2.clx, and the British English Dictionary sscebr2.clx.

description: Dictionary file used by various software products, including Adobe Acrobat, Adobe Illustrator, and Adobe InDesign; contains a word list used by the spell checker; used for spell checking documents against standard dictionary words.
